<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced School Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5036) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 203 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271) (Level 10)

</column>

---

You gain access to the advanced teachings of your arcane institution, learning a powerful new school spell. You gain the advanced school spell for your arcane school.
name: Advanced School Spell
